descriptionNullable:
### Context

Always wanted to know how a popular show is actually popular? is it the duration? is it the total episodes? is it solely based on story?  or is it based on all of them?  

### Content

This data set consists of 7 columns:
Rankings 
Title
Episodes aired
Duration
Ratings
Members watched 

I webscraped the data from the MAL site and converted the top 300 anime into a dataset, later performed data cleaning and data analysis to answer the questions above mentioned 


### Acknowledgements

I am very thankful to the MAL i.e My anime list website for permitting the users to scrap the data and get insights about the anime platform
title: MyAnimeList(MAL) Dataset
subtitle: Webscraping and analysis
description:
